prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with vibrant red wings and a shadowy body structure.
I want an intimidating creature with a sleek form, showcasing black and red colors.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of darkness and destruction.
Make a flying-type Pokemon with an impressive wingspan and a striking color contrast.
Imagine a mythical being that thrives in the shadows, featuring bold red accents.
Design a fearsome creature with a powerful presence and a unique silhouette.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elegance and menace, with dark hues dominating its palette.
